#summary Golf Markup Language Documentation: complexType HoleStatistics.

== Name ==

HoleStatistics (complexType)

  	

===  Super Types ===
{{{
anyType
  |
  +--HoleStatistics (restriction)
}}}
----
    

===  Documentation ===
        
			Type used to record basic hole statistics such as fairway hits and greens in regulation.
		
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
---- 	
        
===  Model ===
{{{
          <...>  (fairway, green-in-regulation, driving-distance, approach-to-hole  )</...>
}}}
----

|| [CLengthWithUnits golfml:LengthWithUnits] || [CLengthWithUnits approach-to-hole] ||  Distance left to hole when ball landed on green. ||
|| [CLengthWithUnits golfml:LengthWithUnits] || [CLengthWithUnits driving-distance] ||  					Driving distance.				 ||
|| xs:boolean || fairway ||  					Fairway hit.				 ||
|| xs:boolean || green-in-regulation ||  					Green reached in regulation.				 ||
